text: The following exceptions apply for all of the Python agents. The list of exceptions are: 1 DRException 2 DRRuntimeException 3 DRUnwindException DRException If this exception is raised it is logged in System Log and the workflow may continue processing. class DRException(Exception) DRRuntimeException If this exception is raised it aborts the workflow. class DRRuntimeException(Exception) DRUnwindException You should never need to catch or throw DRUnwindException . class DRUnwindException(BaseException)
title: Exceptions for Python - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
